content: BET SERVİCES | ANONSPORTS LİVE STREAMLİVE SPORTS AND MATCH BROADCAST SYSTEMSAbout Our System24/7 PREMIUM CHANNELSOur live broadcast system provides broadcasting service in +70 categories such as Football, Basketball, Tennis, Volleyball. There are +44 Football leagues in our structure.How do we work?-We provide hosting, installation, technical support and ad placement with your domain name and your arrival.-In case of having additional domain names, we perform automatic checks from our system in TİB cases and change your domain name free of charge.API SERVİCES-Api-xml-json -data of custom publications and compatible with all systemsOur Management Panel-We have an easily manageable admin panel, on our panel there are logo, banner, favicon, pageskin, menu management, specially developed cache system and theme management.Our themes-There are 2 themes belonging to our system.-If HTML/CSS is sent upon request, we provide its integration into our system for a fee.Our Broadcast Data-It was created by combining the data of 4 different APIs and premium publications.-Our broadcasts exit and reach you from the dedicated AWS-HETZNR-OVH servers. We provide pricing according to your traffic hit, you do not pay for the traffic you do not receive.DEMOhttps://bigbrotv.comPayment after installation+20 reference systemsContact us for detailed information !7/24 LIVE SUPPORTmai̇l:anonsports@outlook.comSKYPE:live:.cid.cf5e7899d87f8341Telegram:t.me/anonsports
